AF.content: archival violence: exergue, capitalize on ellipse, accumulates capital in advance, anticipates so to institute (Gewalt)

WM.content: TN. exergue as place on coin for inscription, ex-ergon, “outside the work,” epigraph
“the exergue effaced” [once section exergue is finished]

OTO.content: btwn title & book to come, exergue situates place from which life will be recited: yes, yes, amen, amen, I sign, I am in debt to “high noon” [instant of signature, no place]

Gii.content: [meanings of Geschlecht and Schlag (i.e. imprint of a coin)]

PIO.content: “Fable” has status of invention, from double position of author/reader, signatory/countersignatory, insofar as it proposes a machine, tekhnē, a self-quoting invention, a printing matrix > process w/out beginning or end, an exergue as impossible as it is necessary

BSi.content: exergue (ex-ergon)—like parergon, out of work that puts to work > but like capital too: makes work happen, comes at head (inscribe date)

OG.content: rigorous investigation beyond closure of knowledge, take positivity of science to its limits—monstrous, breaks absolutely w/ normality > faithful to l’avenir (for which there is yet no exergue [chapter title: exergue])
